title: LEEK SOUP
directions: 1. In a 4- to 6-quart pot, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onions, shallots, and leeks. Stir, and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in chicken broth and thyme; cover and bring to a boil.
2. Add potatoes, salt, and pepper; mix well and cook for 20 minutes.
3. Purée soup with an immersion blender or in a food processor. Adjust seasoning, if needed.
ingredients: 2 leeks, halved lengthwise, rinsed, and sliced
2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves or 2 teaspoons dried
1 large potato, peeled and coarsely chopped
